articles.title: Uber Charges Rs 32 Lakh To British Man For A 15-Minute Ride: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A British man was left stunned when he checked his bank account and found that Uber had intended to charge him almost $39,317 nearly 32 lakh Rupees for just a 15-minute ride
articles.content:
Oliver Kaplan, 22, recently used the ride-share application to request a car after work.
